3_formula_bank: ğŸ§® Identify what must be true for the statement to make sense.

4_micro_examples: Statement: 'You should exercise daily.' Assumption: Exercise is good for health.
Statement: 'Please close the door.' Assumption: The door is open.
Statement: 'All students must bring ID cards.' Assumption: Some students may forget ID cards.
Statement: 'The train is late.' Assumption: The train was expected to arrive earlier.
Statement: 'Use eco-friendly bags.' Assumption: Plastic bags are not eco-friendly.

5_exam_examples.question: Statement: 'Government should ban single-use plastics.' Assumption: Single-use plastics are harmful.
Statement: 'Students should study regularly.' Assumption: Regular study leads to better results.
Statement: 'Please switch off the lights.' Assumption: The lights are on.
Statement: 'All employees must wear uniforms.' Assumption: Some employees may not wear uniforms otherwise.
solution_steps: Assumption: Some may not wear uniforms

5_exam_examples.question: Statement: 'The city needs more parks.' Assumption: Existing parks are insufficient.
